channel.title: What is the best Forum to use?
channel.description: Okey. so i use forumotion but i cant a shit . like i want do delete the advertise to them. and the google search bar if i could do that i am happy. so please help me tell me a good forum without ads.

item.title: What is the best Forum to use?
item.dc:creator: @smkscape smkscape
item.description:
@smkscape wrote:

I recommed using a free webhosting provider. http://smk-hosting.info/billing/cart.php offers free hosting. When you got the hosting account up. You can install SMF yourself. Its all free. You have to register a co.cc domain and set the DNS to it. If you need more information add me on msn: pins@jvmwebclient.com

Read full topic
item.source: What is the best Forum to use?

item.title: What is the best Forum to use?
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

[quote=“Cod3r Crazy, post:1, topic:367320”]Okey.
so i use forumotion but i cant a shit .
like i want do delete the advertise to them.
and the google search bar if i could do that i am happy.
so please help me
tell me a good forum without ads.[/quote]
the only free forum i know without good ads is freeforums.org, but if you have that for free, you can make it so staff members dont see ads, but i guess thats as close as youll get to no ad forum, but they can donate in the community chest using paypal, and you can lead up to your own domain (e.g. yourforum.com) or take out ads.

plus, this isnt really server help…

Read full topic
item.source: What is the best Forum to use?

item.title: What is the best Forum to use?

item.description:
@deans1243 wrote:

if your using a free forum i dont think there will be any withought advertisment. i thing you have to pay for a domain if you dont want advertising on it.
